brief: Thank you for using I PERSONA and we are very interested in your trust in us , we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information
brief_1: The information you share with us helps us to provide you with the best experience of psychological care services with I PERSONA. the privacy policy refers to the privacy practices that we follow regarding all psychological care services that we provide worldwide.the privacy policy , along with the terms of use, includes the general rules and policies governing your use of our platform.
paragraph_1: Collection and use of personal information and data :
paragraph_2: When you request to contact us or want to get one of our services in the field of psychological care, we ask you to register the name, phone number, email case and we will not use this information except for the purpose of providing psychological care services to you, however, you can register with an anonymous account .
paragraph_4: We do not collect any personal information related to you from any other source outside of your use of the site or when you call the registered numbers, in addition, we undertake not to share your personal information with any other party .
paragraph_5: When registering your personal data, we use it to constantly develop our services for you or inform you of all updates and news related to the site .
paragraph_6: The data required to be obtained from you :
paragraph_11: We may also ask you to provide us with information about the collection of payments from your credit card and after making a transaction this information will not be stored (credit cards / Social Security numbers / financial data, etc. on our servers )
paragraph_12: The privacy policy is related to the internet only : the Privacy Policy includes data and information collected only through the site and does not include any other means of communication .
paragraph_13: How do we keep your personal data
paragraph_14: Maintaining data privacy is very important for us more than it is important for you, that.s why we provide physical electronic guarantees and strict procedures designed specifically to preserve your data to ensure that it does not reach unauthorized persons .we use electronic protocols and encryption techniques that prevent the leakage and transfer of any personal information about you to any other parties.
paragraph_15: You have the right to delete any data at any time if desired .
paragraph_16: We provide the feature of using a secure server and all the sensitive / credit information provided is sent via the secure quote layer protocol technology and then recorded in the database of our payment gateway providers so that the information is available only to individuals granted special access to these systems and who are required to maintain the confidentiality of the information .
paragraph_17: Our data is stored with an external provider that holds industry-recognized certificates and audits, including the payment card industry data security standard level I, the ISO 27001 standard, the moderate impact standard of the Federal Information Security Management Act, the Federal Risk Management and authorization program, the health insurance transfer and Accountability Act, the audit report of the service organization controls 1 (previously referred to as the statement of audit standards No. 70 and / or the statement of the standards of certification tasks No. 16) and the audit report of the service organization controls 2
paragraph_18: We also ensure that all our data is password protected, and that data can be accessed through multi-factor authentication. Not all members of the e-Persona  team have access to any data collected, as only individuals with specific roles are allowed to see the data collected. When you store your data on our servers, we pseudonymize and encrypt it to maintain anonymity and provide an additional layer of security in the event of a data breach
paragraph_19: How long we retain your data : the criteria used to determine the period of storage of personal data is the respective statutory retention period. After that period, the corresponding data is routinely deleted, as long as it is no longer necessary to carry out our services. We process and store your personal data only for the period necessary to achieve the purpose of storage. Accordingly, if we have your e-mail address because we provide certain services to you, we retain the e-mail address for the entire period in which we provide such services to you.  Basically, we keep your data until your account is deleted. You can view the data we collect from you at any time, and you may request to delete it at any time by accessing your account settings.
paragraph_20: cookie usage policy cookies are small files that a website or service provider transfers to a computer.s hard drive through your web browser (if you allow it) that enable the website or service provider.s systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information.
paragraph_21: We use cookies to improve your analytics experience and to show tailored offers for your previous visits to our website.
paragraph_22: You can choose to turn off all cookies by accessing your browser settings. Like most websites, if you turn off Cookies, some of our services may not work
paragraph_23: In a proper way. Non-disclosure of information to third parties we do not sell, trade or otherwise transfer your Personally Identifiable Information to third parties. This does not include trusted third parties who help us operate our website, conduct our business or provide you with services, as long as these parties have agreed to keep this information confidential. We may also disclose your information when we believe that its release is in compliance with the law, for the purpose of implementing our site policies, protecting our rights or the rights or property of others, for marketing, advertising or other purposes.
paragraph_24: all payment details and personally identifiable information will not be stored, sold, viewed or registered with any third parties.
paragraph_25: disclosure regarding the Google Display Advertising Platform we apply the features of Google Analytics, or Google Analytics, which uses the display advertising information in order to prepare reports of demographics and interests via the Google Analytics tool
paragraph_26: . You can unsubscribe from the Google Analytics tool for the Google Display Advertising Platform in order to prevent the use of your data by the Google Analytics tool, this is done by going to the unsubscribe page of the Google Analytics tool.
paragraph_27: We use First-party cookies, together with third-party vendors (including Google Inc.), (such as Google Analytics cookies) and third-party cookies (such as DoubleClick cookies) in order to inform about how the appearance of advertising, other uses of advertising services, interactions with the appearance of advertising and advertising services relate to a visit to our website. You can read more about the cookies used by the Google Analytics Advertising Features by going to the Privacy Policy page of the Google Analytics Platform
paragraph_28: third party links: we may list or offer products or services provided by a third party on our website. Third-party sites adopt separate and independent privacy policies. Therefore, we assume no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked websites. However, we strive to protect the integrity of our site, and we welcome any feedback or feedback about those sites. We strongly advise you to read the Privacy Policy and the terms and conditions contained on each website you visit
paragraph_29: . Your rights: you have the right to receive confirmation as to whether your personal data is being processed or not. And you can contact us at any time to claim this right you have the right to request information that we are currently processing. You can also request the following for the purposes of processing; the categories of personal data concerned; the beneficiaries or categories of beneficiaries to whom the personal data has been or will be disclosed, in particular beneficiaries located in third countries or international organizations; the established period for which the personal data will be stored, where possible, or the criteria used to determine that period if this is not possible; the right to request correction or erasure of personal data from the controller, restriction of the processing of personal data related to the data owner, or to object to the data processing; the right to file a complaint with a supervisory authority; in case of non-collection of personal data from The owner of the data, and any information available from its source.  You have the right to inform us about the change of your information, when the information we have in the file is no longer accurate. In view of the purposes of processing, you have the right to complete incomplete personal data, including the provision of a supplementary statement.  You have every right to request erasure of personal data without undue delay. You have the right to receive personal data about you submitted to the console, in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format. You have the right to object, at any time, to the processing of your personal data. We will not process personal data in case of objection to this, unless we find legitimate and compelling reasons for processing the data that would obscure your interests, rights and freedoms, or to file, exercise or defend legal actions you have the right to withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal data at any time
paragraph_30: . Terms of Use please see the terms of use which define usage, disclaimers and limits
paragraph_31: Liability governing the use of our website. ipersona.me by visiting the following link .
paragraph_32: Your consent : you agree to our privacy policy when visiting our website the terms of Use and the Privacy Policy contained on the website may be changed or updated from time to time to meet legal requirements and standards. Therefore, we would like to urge you to visit these sections frequently in order to be informed about the changes being made on the site. The amendments are considered effective on the day of their publication
paragraph_33: . Contact us if you have any questions regarding the Privacy Policy, You can contact us by e-mail at the following address info@ipersona.me

explain_line_30: In the event that you cancel the session reservation. with a physician or Psychotherapist through audio or video chat 48 before the start of the session time as a maximum of forty-eight You are entitled to a full refund for the service.
explain_line_31: In the event that you cancel the audio or video session reservation with the doctor or psychiatrist before the session date Within 24 hours, you are entitled to a 70% refund , Only for the service .
explain_line_32: In the event that you cancel the audio or video session reservation with the psychiatrist or psychologist on the same day, you only have the right to change the appointment or choose another doctor or therapist.
explain_line_33: If you want to change the session date or choose another doctor or psychotherapist after booking the first time and cancelling on the same day of session will be changed and the doctor or psychotherapist will be selected within 48 hours or will losing full service without refund.
explain_line_34: If the service has been paid by credit card, the money will be refunded within 10 to 15 working days, according to the bank’s system. Your credit account.
